subject: Russo-Ukrainian War
object: 20 February 2014 - present | (8 years, 4 months, 1 week and 5 days) | Russian invasion of Ukraine: 24 February 2022 - present | (4 months, 1 week and 1 day)

subject: Russo-Ukrainian War
object: Changes prior to 2022 invasion | Annexation of Crimea by Russia | Occupation of the Kherson Oblast portion of Crimean peninsula (Strilkove) from March to December 2014 | Pro-Russian forces control the eastern Donbas

extra.object: 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine.svg | The military situation as of 28 June 2022 | [update] |, during the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine | .mw-parser-output .legend{page-break-inside:avoid;break-inside:avoid-column}.mw-parser-output .legend-color{display:inline-block;min-width:1.25em;height:1.25em;line-height:1.25;margin:1px 0;text-align:center;border:1px solid #000;background-color:transparent;color:#000} | Controlled by Ukraine | Occupied by Russia and pro-Russian forces | For a more detailed map, see the Russo-Ukrainian War detailed map

subject: Belligerents
object: Ukraine, Russia, Donetsk People's Republic, Luhansk People's Republic, Belarus (since 2022)

subject: Commanders and leaders
object: Volodymyr Zelenskyy, Petro Poroshenko, Oleksandr Turchynov, Vladimir Putin, Sergei Shoigu

subject: Strength
object: See Annexation of Crimea by the Russian Federation, Combatants of the war in Donbas, Order of battle for the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine

subject: Casualties and losses
object: 4,619 killed, 9,700-10,700 wounded, 70 missing, 2,768 captured, 300+ T-64 tanks
